name: Scribble (itch)
description:
Scribble is the greatest game that has ever been made in the world. Wanna know why? Read on...

It's fun

Scribble is fun because there are many scribbles that do things.

It's free

Scribble is also free, and there is no such thing as a bad free game.

It's fair

There's no cheating in Scribble!

To top it all off, Scribble has a world renowned soundtrack that will make your ears dance.

Scribble is available in the browser, on Windows, Mac, and Linux, as well as coming soon to iOS and Android.

Warning: this VIDEO GAME contains trace amounts of epilepsy. Viewer discretion is strongly recommended.
